channel.title: Only one charecter per ip address?
channel.description:
basically my server dont have many people at the minute but i keep getting people opening my server twice and pk with themselfs to get the pk items, which is getting very annoying because i end up with about 30 unused charecters in my players files, so what im asking is, is there anyway that i can block the same ip from connecting twice, ive already sorted out the starter trading by making the starter items suck (bronze scimmy,iron scimmy and so on) but its making me realy angry that ive worked pretty hard on my server for people to come online and cheat.
thanks everyone and i hope you can help. if it can not be done could you please tell me also instead of me waiting for replys all night =D
korey
------------------------- Rune-Revolution
